properties.log-message: Mapa Sanitario Facility Fetch request failed: ${invokehttp.java.exception.class} ${invokehttp.java.exception.message}

properties.SQL select query:
select f.*, jsonb_agg(json_build_object('code', s.code, 'name', s.name)) as services
from ms.facility f
join ms.facility_service fs on f.id=fs.facility_id
join ms.service s on fs.service_id=s.id
group by f.id;
